
## Find Services Near You

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="35%"}
```{=html}
<div class="filter-panel">
  <h3>Search</h3>

  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="zip" class="form-label">ZIP code</label>
    <input type="text" id="zip" class="form-control" placeholder="e.g., 46202">
    <div class="form-text">
      In the full version, this will zoom the map and filter nearby services.
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="service-type" class="form-label">Harm reduction service type</label>
    <select id="service-type" class="form-select">
      <option selected>All harm reduction services</option>
      <option>Syringe service programs (SSPs)</option>
      <option>Naloxone distribution</option>
      <option>MOUD / treatment programs</option>
      <option>Supportive housing / low-barrier shelters</option>
    </select>
    <div class="form-text">
      In the full version, this will filter the map and results list by service type.
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="mb-3">
    <label for="distance" class="form-label">Travel distance</label>
    <select id="distance" class="form-select">
      <option>Within 5 miles</option>
      <option selected>Within 10 miles</option>
      <option>Within 25 miles</option>
      <option>Statewide</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <button class="btn btn-primary w-100" disabled>
    Search (prototype)
  </button>
</div>
```
:::
